name: Hands up! Charades
description:
Do you like parties with your friends?
Are you fond of funny games for big companies?
So, let me introduce amazing game for you and your friends – Hands up!
Hands up – it is the best game for the cheerful and smart people.
The rules are simple. You need to attach a phone to your forehead and guess the words, which your friends will explain you. Words for explanation will appear on the screen of your phone.
If you guess the word - tilt the phone forward, if not – tilt it back. As much words you will guess – more points you will get!
Hands up it is a fun game for those who like having a good time!
